content: {A心虚目移}I've been away from Gran'mama's for... W-Well, it's just, it's been so long since someone took care of me like this.
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: Although I'm bad at most things, at least I can grow lickle sproutsies for you. Remember that mysterious seed on the talisman mah?
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: Though, I guess I haven't tried hard enough to live on my own. I've just been relyin' on you all this time...
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: {A害羞冒烟}Thank you! I'll work hard to learn crab-catching for real. I wanna become someone you can rely on, too.
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: {A笑眯眯}It grew, and I'm pretty sure it's some kinda fruit. I think it'll bear fruit soon, so just get ready to taste it~! <style=SizeSmall>Do sea crabs taste good? What if I cook them with snowy cantaloupe, some cream, and fish mint...?</style>
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: {A开心}I just feel so happy that you got justice for me! Like maybe life's not so hard after all.
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: {A想到了}So this is a sea crab, huh... It's huge...{短暂停} No idea what it tastes like. Compared to river ones...{短暂停} <style=SizeSmall>it would make better fertilizer!</style>
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: It's okay if you lean on me a little more, Yunguo.
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线

content: Thank you. Seeing it get what it deserves made me feel much better.
info: 云果小故事-抓住螃蟹的感谢_云果故事线
